thread.section_title: Frame My TV Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Frame My TV | framemytv.com
thread.title: Scott Schwerdt
thread.title_full: Frame My TV reviewed by Scott Schwerdt

author: Scott Schwerdt
title: Scott Schwerdt
text: I found Frame My TV on the Internet Once we decided on purchasing, the service and support was excellent. We were contacted by phone to answer any questions and give recommendations. In the end, Our mirror-glAssed TV is the most frequently noticed feature in Our new home. We've had 24,000 people walk through our home and they alll comment on the quality and craftsmanship.
